channel.title: Construction?

item.title: Construction?
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

see in questtab i’ve this :

case 114128://range pots
if (c.inWild() && c.isBanking) {
c.sendMessage(“You cannot do this right now”);
} else if(c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 1) {
c.sendMessage(“You need atleast 1 free slot’s to use this feature.”);
} else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 36000)) {
c.getItems().deleteItem2(995, 36000);
c.getItems().addItem(2445,100);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need atleast 36,000 coins to use this feature.”);
}
break;

how to make something like that for construction, but that it then set an object?

and where to find globalobjects…?

i’ve only 1 thing in my global-objects.cfg

Read full topic

item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

In actionbuttons.java if u have the id add. makeGlobalObject(coordX, coordY, objectID, objectType);

item.title: Construction?
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

In my musictab I’ve add this :

addHoverText(4287, “Wall (level 1)”, “built”, TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addHoverText(4288, “Table (level 5)”, “built”, TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addHoverText(4289, “Spinningwheel (level 20)”, “built”, TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);

but How do I delete all that other text like that music…
and how do I make it so when I click on built it will make that object?
